name: vite-tailwind-alpinejs
description: A fork of Shopify Theme lab using Vite instead of Webpack and Alpine.js in place of Vue.js
author: James Auble

scripts.deploy: run-s vite:build && shopify theme push --path shopify -e production
scripts.deploy:dev: run-s vite:build && shopify theme push --path shopify -e development
scripts.deploy:staging: run-s vite:build && shopify theme push --path shopify -e staging
scripts.deploy:new: run-s vite:build && shopify theme push --unpublished --path shopify
